overview:
The founder grew up in Montana and attended Tulane University in New Orleans, Louisiana, later to transfer to Tulane’s A.B. Freeman School of Business. He graduated with a B.S. in Business Management with a concentration in Accounting.

He was recruited prior to graduating to KPMG Peat Marwick, a public accounting firm in San Jose, California, at which time he became aware of his true interest when he took on a position with a custom accounting software development company in Foster City, CA.

Information Technology become his passion as he became one of the first Network Engineers in Silicon Valley with a strong background in Unix, Novell, Windows Server OS, OSX, with a profound understanding of the physical layer (e.g. Cisco, Firewalls, PC Support, Systems Integration, Web Application Development, Database Design and Implementation) for clients (e.g. Wells Fargo Bank, Visa International, Non-Profit, and Silicon Valley small companies).

He is now a passionate entrepreneur and strives to improve the regional business environment in northern California.

Established in 2011, Sacramento Design Network, Inc. is a full service web agency that can help you with website construction, custom web applications, digital marketing and online branding.

Sacramento Design Network Team’s goal is to provide custom services, thoroughly planned, creative and effective. We plan for future growth using the latest technology and improve lead generation by creating very usable websites.

Once your great site is completed, we help you get high rankings for your website on search engines, improve visibility in social media, etc. via our internet marketing services.

Our goal is to get you new business leads and keep you above your competitors, so that you get the new business!
